setParameter.name: SampleDatabase-Web.config Connection String
setParameter.value: Server={{DB SERVER}};Database={{DB SAMPLE}};User Id={{DB SAMPLE READ USERNAME}};Password={{DB SAMPLE READ PASSWORD}}

setParameter.name: CoreDatabase-Web.config Connection String
setParameter.value: Server={{DB SERVER}};Database={{DB CORE}};User Id={{DB CORE USERNAME}};Password={{DB CORE PASSWORD}}
